articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.title: Chest radiographs for tuberculosis care. A boon or bane? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: This article is authored by Dr. Sarabjit Chadha, regional technical director, India and SE Asia and Dr. Kavindhran Velen senior scientist, TB Access at FIND.
articles.content: Tuberculosis (TB) remains a serious public health problem in India. Chest X-rays are a key tool in the fight against TB, as a fast, low-cost, non-invasive screening tool that can detect signs of TB i… [+5908 chars]
